subject: Re: [R] sequences
body:
livia wrote:
> Hi, I would like to generate a series in the following form (0.8^1, 0.8^2,
> ..., 0.8^600)
> Could anyone tell me how can I achieve that? I am really new to R.

8^(1:600)
